nodes.text: The Kajain'sa'Nikto, also known as the Red Nikto, were a subspecies of the sentient humanoid Nikto species from the planet Kintan. Their natural habitat was desert or wastelands. Aside from their skin color, they were also distinguished by their scaly, coarse skin, and their horns and spikes. Members of the subspecies included the Jedi Master Ima-Gun Di, galactic crime lord Rinnrivin Di, and Vedain, an employee of Jabba the Hutt. Many Kajain'sa'Nikto lived to serve the Hutt families as well.
